1 a.definition: an intentional or criminally negligent act that causes pain and suffering [ to animals] [ to children]

sub_terms.b: mistreatment or neglect that causes pain and suffering compare

1 a.note: Cruelty is an aggravating circumstance to a crime (as murder).

2.definition: a spouse's conduct that endangers life or health or causes mental suffering or fear called also
2.note: Cruelty is a ground for divorce.
